verses.text_uthmani: لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَمْ يَكُنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14587'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِنْ أَهْلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':545'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':10916'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُشْرِكِينَ مُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14588'>نف</tajweed>َكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14589'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lam yakunil-lażīna kafarū min ahlil-kitābi wal-musyrikīna munfakkīna ḥattā ta'tiyahumul-bayyinah(tu).
verses.translation: Неверные из тех, кто получил Писанье, И многобожники Не отошли бы (от своих учений) До той поры, пока к ним не пришло Открытое свидетельство (Господне)

verses.text_uthmani: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتْلُوا۟ صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: رَسُو<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14590'>لٌ م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':321'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ يَتْلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> صُحُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14591'>فًا م</tajweed>ُّطَهَّرَةً
verses.translation: Посланник от Аллаха, читающий им Свитки В их праведности и чистоте

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِيهَا كُتُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14592'>بٌ ق</tajweed>َيِّمَةٌ
verses.translation: В которых с ясностью даны Установления Господни

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14593'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':524'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بَ إِلَّا م<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':146'>ِنۢ ب</tajweed>َعْدِ مَا ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَتْهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14594'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā tafarraqal-lażīna ūtul-kitāba illā mim ba'di mā jā'athumul-bayyinah(tu).
verses.translation: И не делились меж собою люди Книги, А (разделение пришло), Когда явилось Ясное Знаменье

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلْقَيِّمَةِ

data-tajweed=':14598'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَيِّمَةِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā umirū illā liya'budullāha mukhliṣīna lahud-dīn(a), ḥunafā'a wa yuqīmuṣ-ṣalāta wa yu'tuz-zakāta  wa żālika dīnul-qayyimah(ti).
verses.translation: И было им повелено уверовать (в Аллаха) И в поклонении Аллаху искренность блюсти, Быть верным в правоверии своем, И по часам творить молитву, И править милостыню для очищенья. Это - религия (Господней) правоты И Истина пути, (указанного Богом)

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':24'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِنْ أَهْلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':545'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':10916'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُشْرِكِينَ فِى نَارِ جَهَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَ خَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِدِينَ فِيه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ‌ۚ</tajweed> أُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14599'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innal-lażīna kafarū min ahlil-kitābi wal-musyrikīna fī nāri jahannama khālidīna fīhā, ulā'ika hum syarrul-bariyyah(ti).
verses.translation: Неверные из тех, кто получил Писанье, И многобожники Гореть навечно будут в адовом огне, - Поистине, они - сквернейшие из всех созданий

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':24'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَعَمِلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':118'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ أُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14600'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innal-lażīna āmanū wa 'amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti ulā'ika hum khairul-bariyyah(ti).
verses.translation: Те ж, кто уверовал в Аллаха И праведные действия вершит, - Прекраснейшие из созданий (Бога)

verses.text_uthmani: جَزَآؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۖ رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ رَبَّهُۥ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: جَز<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓؤُهُمْ عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':264'>ند</tajweed>َ رَبِّهِمْ جَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تُ عَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':5720'>دْ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8049'>نٍ ت</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':120'>جْ</tajweed>رِى مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':121'>ن ت</tajweed>َحْتِهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':122'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَنْهَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رُ خَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِدِينَ فِيه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَبَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3909'>دًا‌ۖ ر</tajweed>َّضِىَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3910'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَنْهُ‌ۚ ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ رَبَّهُۥ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Jazā'uhum 'inda rabbihim jannātu 'adnin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadā(n), raḍiyallāhu 'anhum wa raḍū 'anh(u), żālika liman khasyiya rabbah(ū).
verses.translation: Господнею наградой им - Эдемские сады, Потоками речными омовенны, Где пребывать навечно им. И там они - к довольствию Аллаха, И к их довольствию - Аллах; Все это - лишь для тех, Кто гнева Господа страшится
